titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the PS 143 Class Book 2012.013
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by John Zarrillo

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-09-22T16:51-0400

did.abstract: A yearbook for PS 143, dated June 1923. The girls school was located on North 6th Street, near Havenmeyer Street, in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn. The yearbook contains original black-and-white photographs of students, teachers, and staff. The book belonged to Carmela (Mildred?) Russo, who was a student and editor of the yearbook.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Gift of Rosalie Damato, 2012. The yearbook belonged to her mother-in-law, Carmela (Mildred) Russo D'Amato.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: A yearbook for PS 143, dated June 1923. The girls school was located on North 6th Street, near Havenmeyer Street, in the Williamsburg neighborhood of Brooklyn. The yearbook contains original black-and-white photographs of students, teachers, and staff. The book belonged to Carmela (Mildred) Russo D'Amato, who was a student and editor of the yearbook.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); P.S. 143 Class Book, 2012.013, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials note
relatedmaterial.p: BHS holds many additional collections relating to Brooklyn schools, including the Brooklyn schools collection (1985.054).
